00001 #include "ProgressHandler.hh"
00002 
00003 #include <UTIL/LCTime.h>
00004 #include "marlin/Exceptions.h"

00006 #include <iostream>
00007 #include <iomanip>
00008 #include <climits>
00009 
00010 namespace CALICE {
00011 
00012   // create instance to make this Processor known to Marlin
00013   ProgressHandler a_ProgressHandler_instance;
00014 
00015   ProgressHandler::ProgressHandler()
00016     : Processor("ProgressHandler")
00017   {
00018     _description = "Report event/run numbers at fixed time intervals, and handle SIGINT (Ctrl-C) for a graceful exit." ;
00019 
00020     registerProcessorParameter( "ReportInterval" ,
00021                                 "The number of seconds after which the number of processed events will be shown." ,
00022                                 _reportInterval ,
00023                                 (int)10 );
00024 
00025   }
00026 
00027   void ProgressHandler::init() {
00028 
00029     printParameters();
00030 
00031     installSignalHandler();
00032     time(&_startTime);
00033     time(&_timeOfLastReport);
00034 
00035     if (_reportInterval<=0) {
00036       _reportInterval=INT_MAX;
00037     }
00038 
00039     _nRuns = 0;
00040     _nEvents = 0;
00041   }
00042 
00043   void ProgressHandler::processRunHeader( LCRunHeader* runP) {
00044     if ( runP) {
00045       ++_nRuns;
00046       _nEventsRun = 0;
00047     }
00048   }
00049 
00050   void ProgressHandler::processEvent( LCEvent * evtP ) {
00051     if (evtP) {
00052       if (isAborted()) {
00053         throw marlin::StopProcessingException(this);
00054       }
00055       ++_nEvents;
00056       ++_nEventsRun;
00057 
00058       time_t now;
00059       time(&now);
00060 
00061       if ( difftime(now,_timeOfLastReport)> _reportInterval ) {
00062         unsigned int eventsSinceLastReport = _nEvents - _nEventsAtLastReport;
00063 
00064         double tb = (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC/1000. ; // timebase in ms
00065 
00066         clock_t nowClock = clock();
00067 
00068         std::cout << "*************************************************" << std::endl
00069                   << "Current run: " << evtP->getRunNumber() << " (" << _nRuns << " runs so far) "
00070                   << " processed events: " << _nEventsRun << " (" << _nEvents << " total) "
00071                   << " processtime: "<< difftime(now,_startTime) << "s" << std::endl
00072                   << "Current event: " << evtP->getEventNumber() << " time: " << UTIL::LCTime(evtP->getTimeStamp()).getDateString() << std::endl
00073                   << "Speed: last event took " << std::setw(5) << std::right << ( nowClock - _clockOfLastEvent)/tb << std::setprecision(3) << "ms"
00074                   << " since last report " << std::setw(5) << std::right  << ( nowClock - _clockOfLastReport)/tb/(double)eventsSinceLastReport << std::setprecision(3) << "ms/event"
00075                   << " rate: " <<  std::setw(7) << std::right<<   eventsSinceLastReport*CLOCKS_PER_SEC/( nowClock - _clockOfLastReport ) << std::setprecision(5) <<"Hz" << std::endl;
00076         _timeOfLastReport = now;
00077         _clockOfLastReport = nowClock;
00078         _nEventsAtLastReport = _nEvents;
00079       }
00080       _clockOfLastEvent = clock();
00081     }
00082   }
00083 
00084   void ProgressHandler::end() {
00085     removeSignalHandler();
00086 
00087     std::cout << std::endl
00088               << "--- " << name() <<" Report :" << std::endl
00089               << "Processed " << _nEvents << " events in " << _nRuns << " runs " << std::endl
00090               << "Average time per event " << std::setw(5) << std::right << (double)difftime(_timeOfLastReport,_startTime)*1000./(double)_nEvents << std::setprecision(3) << "ms/event" << std::endl
00091               << "Average rate: " <<  std::setw(7) << std::right << (double)_nEvents/(double)difftime(_timeOfLastReport,_startTime) << std::setprecision(5) << "Hz" << std::endl;
00092     if (isAborted()) {
00093               std::cout << "Processing was aborted manually." << std::endl;
00094     }
00095     std::cout << std::endl;
00096 
00097   }
00098 
00099   int ProgressHandler::__abortSignalRecieved=0;
00100   int ProgressHandler::__signalHandlerInstalled=0;
00101   struct sigaction ProgressHandler::__oldSignalHandler;
00102   struct sigaction ProgressHandler::__newSignalHandler;
00103 
00104   void ProgressHandler::installSignalHandler()
00105   {
00106     __signalHandlerInstalled++;
00107     if (__signalHandlerInstalled==1) {
00108 
00109       __newSignalHandler.sa_handler=ProgressHandler::termSignalHandler;
00110       sigemptyset(&__newSignalHandler.sa_mask);
00111       __newSignalHandler.sa_flags = 0;
00112       __abortSignalRecieved=0;
00113 
00114       if (sigaction(SIGINT, &__newSignalHandler, &__oldSignalHandler)) {
00115         __signalHandlerInstalled--;
00116       }
00117     }
00118   }
00119 
00120   void ProgressHandler::removeSignalHandler()
00121   {
00122     if (__signalHandlerInstalled>0) {
00123       if (__signalHandlerInstalled--==1) {
00124         sigaction(SIGINT, &__oldSignalHandler,NULL);
00125         __signalHandlerInstalled=0;
00126       }
00127     }
00128   }
00129 
00130   void ProgressHandler::termSignalHandler(int sig)
00131   {
00132     if (sig==SIGINT || sig==SIGTERM)
00133       __abortSignalRecieved=sig;
00134   }
00135 
00136 }
